nelatra@nelatra.title: Nelatra's Magic Center
nelatra@nelatra.description:
Here many magician apprentices have gathered to learn from the goddess
of all mages, Nelatra.  The entire domain glows with a bright aura, and
magical energy swirls about her devotees.  You may experience this too, if
you serve her well.

nelatra@nelatra.name: nelatra
nelatra@nelatra.description: &+BN&+Ce&+Bl&+Ca&+Bt&+Cr&+Ba&* is here glowing with magical power.
